alert.note: Alert for Schoharie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 19 at 3:39AM EST until December 19 at 9:54AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Schoharie Creek at Gilboa Bridge. * WHEN...Until late this morning. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Minor flood stage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:15 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 17.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early this morning and continue falling to 13.0 feet early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Schoharie Creek Gilboa Bridge Flood Stage: 17.0 Observed Stage at Tue 3 am: 17.2 Forecast: Tue 7 am 16.3 Tue 1 pm 15.1 Tue 7 pm 14.2 Wed 1 am 13.9 Wed 7 am 13.5 Wed 1 pm 13.0 Wed 7 pm 13.0 Thu 1 am 12.9 Thu 7 am 12.9 Thu 1 pm 13.3 Thu 7 pm 13.1 &&
